content.formatted_body:
In reply to @usharma:igalia.com
You don't need Docker or Java to build a Jekyll site, right?
the HTML validator depends on Java (OpenJDK) bc that's how sideshowbarker wrote it

content.body: ryzokuken, if you think it's bad now, wonder what you'll think once a proper a11y checker is implemented, which would require a headless browser (something like puppeteer)
